sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To explore the full-term pregnancy the amniotic fluid of pregnant women decreased vaginal delivery security.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨足月妊娠羊水偏少的孕妇阴式分娩的安全性。

sentences.english: Body fat content of macrosomias under 3 years is higher than that in full-term infants.
sentences.chinese: 巨大儿3岁内体脂含量均超过足月正常儿。

sentences.english: After surgical intervention the fetal sheep continued on its gestation.
sentences.chinese: 术后母绵羊继续妊娠，待足月后行剖腹产取胎羊。

sentences.english: The infants were devided into preterm group and term group according to gestational age and birth weigh.
sentences.chinese: 根据胎龄及出生体重将研究对象分为早产组及足月组。

sentences.english: The above ophthalmopathy mainly aims at the full-term baby.
sentences.chinese: 以上眼病主要针对足月婴儿。

sentences.english: The myelination process of all cases were completed as normal term infants.
sentences.chinese: 所有17例之体鞘形成都如足月儿一样已完成。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the influence of preterm premature rupture of membranes (PPROM) on neurological development of preterm infants.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨未足月胎膜早破对早产儿神经发育的影响。

sentences.english: Women with mild disease remote from term can be managed expectantly to enable fetal growth and maturation.
sentences.chinese: 疾病较轻且离足月尚早的孕妇可期待胎儿生长和成熟。

sentences.english: Objective To analyse the causes of misdiagnosis of postpartum choriocarcinoma and their prognosis .
sentences.chinese: 目的分析足月产后绒癌常见的误诊原因及其预后。

sentences.english: Women with PPROM should be hospitalized until delivery.
sentences.chinese: 足月前胎膜早破的患者应住院观察直到分娩。

sentences.english: Objective:To observe the security of castor-oil plant in induced labor for mature foetus.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨足月妊娠羊水偏少的孕妇阴式分娩的安全性。

sentences.english: F. At term, about 8% of patients will present with ruptured membranes prior to the onset of labor.
sentences.chinese: 足月后约8%患者在产程开始前出现胎膜破裂。

definition: expected date of childbirth/estimated due date (EDD)
to become pregnant/to carry a child in the womb
to face childbirth/about to give birth/refers esp. to the onset of regular contractions
to give birth without complications/easy childbirth/safe delivery/natural birth (without surgical operation)
